body_html: I resolved the issue. I tried the default gcc for my system, 6.2.1, which failed. I then tried a symlink to gcc-5, which failed in another way (complained about the cross compiler), but when I provided the full path to /usr/bin/gcc-5 in the ./configure step, the compilation worked.
body_text: I resolved the issue. I tried the default gcc for my system, 6.2.1, which failed. I then tried a symlink to gcc-5, which failed in another way (complained about the cross compiler), but when I provided the full path to /usr/bin/gcc-5 in the ./configure step, the compilation worked.
body: I resolved the issue. I tried the default gcc for my system, 6.2.1, which failed. I then tried a symlink to gcc-5, which failed in another way (complained about the cross compiler), but when I provided the full path to /usr/bin/gcc-5 in the ./configure step, the compilation worked.
